name: Morning Star Bullish Reversal Pattern
question: Which stocks are forming morning star bullish reversal patterns?

description: Identifies morning star patterns - three-candle bullish reversal formations consisting of a long red candle, small-bodied candle (star), and confirming green candle. Analyzes pattern completion, gap characteristics, and volume confirmation for authentic reversal signals.
